info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 September 2023,  路 Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
The host is extremely responsive and made us feel welcome. He was flexible with check in and check out and responded instantly whenever we needed something.
The apartment is spacious and located on a very quiet street which is rare for Dhaka. we stayed for two weeks and the space felt comfortable for a longer stay.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 May 2023,  路 Stayed about a week
rating_comment:
Its very quiet place and perfect  for doing office, and pretty fast internet. It has nice view from the balcony. The location is ideal for easy access to shops and restaurants. However, I would suggest to keep some mosquitoes protection with you all time.
The flat has all required amenities, furthermore, the host is very responsive and helpful. Any issues I have communicated with the host and he has promptly solved and he always ensures I am having a pleasant stay.
I would definitely stay again in this place  and would recommend the place to everyone

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 April 2023,  路 Stayed one night
rating_comment: A lovely, spacious apartment situated on a leafy, suburban road in Banani. This place is tidy, has a washing machine and access to clean, drinking water, which is always a plus for me when abroad. The host was nice and checked in regularly to see if everything was ok. Would book again!
